main event: On July 7, 1964, witnesses reported seeing a rapidly moving white light in the sky over Lynn, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The light was observed for approximately 15 seconds,The object was described as about the size of a dime at arm's length,The object moved faster than any conventional aircraft,The sighting was made by multiple civilian observers,Weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Mrs. Edith N. Chesley, 53, Secretary, and other civilian observers.
